Title: French Omelette
Author: eredwar
Instructions: Beat the eggs and whisk in medium bowl.
Melt the butter.
Pour the eggs into the pan. With the bowl of a fork, tines facing up, rapidly stir the eggs.
Move the fork all around the pan to break up the eggs as they cook.
At the same time, hold the handle of the pan with the other hand and vigorously shake the pan back and forth.
Remove the pan from the heat. Run the fork around the edges to release the eggs.
Tilt the pan to a 45-degree angle so that the eggs move to one side of the pan.
Tilt a plate right next to the omelette and tip it onto the plate so the seam is on the bottom.
Sprinkle with chives or parsley, if you'd like, and serve.

Title: Chilaquiles
Author: eredwar
Instructions: If using tortillas, cut and fry them in the oil.
Combine the salsa and stock in a pan on medium heat and reduce until desired thickness.
Add the tortilla chips back in, and reduce heat to low.
After the tortilla chips reach desired consistency, turn off the heat and plate.
Add toppings as desired.

Title: Shakshuka
Author: eredwar
Instructions: Heat olive oil in large pan on medium heat.
Add veggies and cook for 5 minutes.
Add garlic and spices and cook for an additional minute.
Pour the can of tomatoes and juice into the pan.
Add salt and pepper to taste, then bring sauce down to a simmer.
Use a spoon to make large wells for the eggs. Pour the eggs in then let them cook.
Cover the pan for 5-8 minutes.
Serve!

Title: Homemade Pizza
Author: eredwar
Instructions: Preheat a pizza stone in oven at 550 F.
Rub work surface down with flour.
Roll out pizza dough.
Add sauce.
Add cheese and pepperoni.
Sprinkle parmesan cheese on top.
Bake pizza for 8-12 minutes.
Remove from rack, and let cool.

Title: NYC Style Pizza
Author: eredwar
Instructions: Preheat a pizza stone in oven at 450 F.
Rub work surface down with flour.
Roll out pizza dough even further.
Add sauce.
Add cheese, pepperoni, and sardines.
Sprinkle parmesan cheese on top.
Bake pizza for 8-12 minutes.
Remove from rack, and let cool.

Title: Vegan Pizza
Author: eredwar
Instructions: Preheat a pizza stone in oven at 450 F.
Rub work surface down with flour.
Roll out pizza dough.
Add sauce.
Slice eggplant.
Add cheese and eggplant slices.
Sprinkle parmesan cheese on top.
Bake pizza for 8-12 minutes.
Remove from rack, and let cool.

Title: Chicken Scarpariello
Author: eredwar
Instructions: Add the oil, and brown the sausage and chicken in a dutch oven on medium-high heat.
Take out the meat, sautee the onions and garlic.
Add in the stock, wine, and vinegar, reduce by half.
Add in the peppers, rosemary, and the meat.
Reduce the sauce to a simmer and cook for half an hour.
Turn off the heat, and serve with the potatoes.

Title: Ratatouille
Author: eredwar
Instructions: Acquire a small rat.
Place it under your hat.

Title: Japanese Style Curry
Author: eredwar
Instructions: Prepare the vegetables. Peel and quarter them.
Grate the ginger and garlic.
Heat the oil in a large skillet.
Dice the chicken, and brown it in the hot oil.
Add in the onions and cook until translucent.
Add in the garlic and ginger and cook until fragrant.
Add in the stock and other liquid ingredients.
Add in the roux.
Simmer, covered, for 15 minutes. Occasionally stirring.
Let cool, and serve with rice.

Title: Paneer Korna
Author: eredwar
Instructions: Set frying pan on medium heat.
Add 2 tbsp of ghee followed by onions, garlic, and carrots. Cook until soft.
Add a good pinch of salt and Korna spice blend.
Transer everything to a pot, and add veggie stock.
Roast red onions, paneer, and peppers separately in ghee in oven at 220 C.
Blend the sauce with an immersion blender.
Combine sauce with roasted vegetables and cheese.
Serve!
